h2_title: Mad Tiger Mini-Boss Fight and Guide
content: He may not have a sword, but the Mad Tiger’s fists work just fine, and can employ many combo attacks. His most common one starts with an uppercut punch, and then a downward strike after a short pause, and is then followed by a huge sweeping claw swipe that spins him around. If you want to try using Rock Solid, save it for the swipe so he doesn’t attack through his first two swings.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mad_Tiger.md', within the main section titled 'Mad Tiger', specifically from the subsection 'Mad Tiger Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
He may not have a sword, but the Mad Tiger’s fists work just fine, and can employ many combo attacks. His most common one starts with an uppercut punch, and then a downward strike after a short pause, and is then followed by a huge sweeping claw swipe that spins him around. If you want to try using Rock Solid, save it for the swipe so he doesn’t attack through his first two swings.
